thread.title: Delta increases stake in Brazil’s GOL
thread.title_full: Delta increases stake in Brazil’s GOL

title: Delta increases stake in Brazil’s GOL
text: Delta increases stake in Brazil’s GOL Jul 13, 2015, 10:13am EDT Share Enlarge Flag of Brazil Delta Air Lines Inc. will boost its stake in low-cost Brazilian airline GOL Linhas Aéreas Inteligentes through a $446 million stock and loan arrangement. Atlanta-based Delta (NYSE: DAL) detailed the agreement in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission . GOL plans to issue up to $146 million of stock and snag a term loan with third parties for up to $300 million. Delta will buy up to $56 million of the stock and guarantee the borrowings under the term loan. Bizspace Spotlight
